general_advisory: Farmers are advised to take care during irrigation and spraying operations due to expected light to moderate rainfall in the upcoming days. Proper drainage systems in fruit orchards and vegetable fields should be maintained. Regular monitoring for pests and diseases in crops is recommended. Avoid excessive use of nitrogenous fertilizer.

advisory: Maintain 5 cm water level in rice field
Stop top dressing of nitrogenous fertilizers in case of bacterial leaf blight
Control case worm attack with specified sprays
Use specific pesticides for gall midge attack
Control sucking insect pest with neem-based pesticide
Avoid chemical insecticides during initial flowering stage
Control fall army worm with specified sprays
Control fruit and shoot borer with specific sprays
Use pesticides for sucking insect pests
Ensure proper drainage to avoid waterlogged conditions
Training, pruning, and cleaning of weeds in old mango orchard
Use specified insecticides for leaf webber infestation
Follow preventive measures for mastitis disease
Adjust feeding to avoid sitting of animals
Sow green fodder for better health benefits
